snippet: Schubert’s difficult Fantasie in C for Violin and Piano is tackled by two impressive German artists.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews recording of Schubert: Fantasie in C, Rondo in B minor, Sonata in A, featuring violinist Carolin Widmann and pianist Alexander Lonquich.
lead_paragraph: Schubert’s difficult Fantasie in C for Violin and Piano is tackled by two impressive German artists.

headline.seo: Schubert Fantasie by Carolin Widmann and Alexander Lonquich
headline.main: Schubert Fantasie by Carolin Widmann and Alexander Lonquich
